verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

צַ֞ו <WH6680> Command אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> and say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> to כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When אַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> you בָּאִ֖ים <WH935> unto them When ye come אֶל־ <WH413> about הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> into the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> of Canaan זֹ֣את <WH2063> likewise הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> (this [is] the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> that תִּפֹּ֤ל <WH5307> that shall fall לָכֶם֙ בְּֽנַחֲלָ֔ה <WH5159> unto you for an inheritance אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> [even] the land כְּנַ֖עַן <WH3667> of Canaan לִגְבֻלֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH1367> with the coasts

וְהָיָ֨ה <WH1961> shall extend לָכֶ֧ם פְּאַת־ <WH6285> quarter נֶ֛גֶב <WH5045> Then your south מִמִּדְבַּר־ <WH4057> shall be from the wilderness צִ֖ן <WH6790> of Zin עַל־ <WH5921> along יְדֵ֣י <WH3027> along by the coast אֱד֑וֹם <WH123> of Edom וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> shall extend לָכֶם֙ גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> border נֶ֔גֶב <WH5045> and your south מִקְצֵ֥ה <WH7097> shall be the outmost coast יָם־ <WH3220> sea הַמֶּ֖לַח <WH4417> of the salt קֵֽדְמָה׃ <WH6924> eastward

וְנָסַ֣ב <WH5437> shall turn לָכֶם֩ הַגְּב֨וּל <WH1366> And your border מִנֶּ֜גֶב <WH5045> from the south לְמַעֲלֵ֤ה עַקְרַבִּים֙ <WH4610> of Akrabbim וְעָ֣בַר <WH5674> and pass on צִ֔נָה <WH6790> to Zin [וְהָיָה כ] (וְהָיוּ֙ <WH1961> become ק) תּֽוֹצְאֹתָ֔יו <WH8444> and the going forth מִנֶּ֖גֶב <WH5045> thereof shall be from the south לְקָדֵ֣שׁ בַּרְנֵ֑עַ <WH6947> to Kadeshbarnea וְיָצָ֥א <WH3318> and shall go on חֲצַר־ אַדָּ֖ר <WH2692> to Hazaraddar וְעָבַ֥ר <WH5674> and pass on עַצְמֹֽנָה׃ <WH6111> to Azmon

וְנָסַ֧ב <WH5437> shall fetch a compass הַגְּב֛וּל <WH1366> And the border מֵעַצְמ֖וֹן <WH6111> from Azmon נַ֣חְלָה <WH5158> unto the river מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> become תוֹצְאֹתָ֖יו <WH8444> and the goings out הַיָּֽמָּה׃ <WH3220> of it shall be at the sea

וּגְב֣וּל <WH1366> border יָ֔ם <WH3220> And [as for] the western וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> shall have לָכֶ֛ם הַיָּ֥ם <WH3220> sea הַגָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> ye shall even have the great וּגְב֑וּל <WH1366> for a border זֶֽה־ <WH2088> this יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> shall have לָכֶ֖ם גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> border יָֽם׃ <WH3220> this shall be your west

וְזֶֽה־ <WH2088> and this יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become לָכֶ֖ם גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> border צָפ֑וֹן <WH6828> And this shall be your north מִן־ <WH4480> at הַיָּם֙ <WH3220> sea הַגָּדֹ֔ל <WH1419> from the great תְּתָא֥וּ <WH8376> ye shall point out לָכֶ֖ם הֹ֥ר <WH2023> Hor הָהָֽר׃ <WH2022> for you mount

מֵהֹ֣ר <WH2023> Hor הָהָ֔ר <WH2022> From mount תְּתָא֖וּ <WH8376> ye shall point out לְבֹ֣א <WH935> [your border] unto the entrance חֲמָ֑ת <WH2574> of Hamath וְהָי֛וּ <WH1961> become תּוֹצְאֹ֥ת <WH8444> and the goings forth הַגְּבֻ֖ל <WH1366> of the border צְדָֽדָה׃ <WH6657> shall be to Zedad

וְיָצָ֤א <WH3318> shall go on הַגְּבֻל֙ <WH1366> And the border זִפְרֹ֔נָה <WH2202> to Ziphron וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> become תוֹצְאֹתָ֖יו <WH8444> and the goings out חֲצַ֣ר עֵינָ֑ן <WH2704> of it shall be at Hazarenan זֶֽה־ <WH2088> This יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become לָכֶ֖ם גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> border צָפֽוֹן׃ <WH6828> this shall be your north
וְהִתְאַוִּיתֶ֥ם <WH184> And ye shall point out לָכֶ֖ם לִגְב֣וּל <WH1366> border קֵ֑דְמָה <WH6924> your east מֵחֲצַ֥ר עֵינָ֖ן <WH2704> from Hazarenan שְׁפָֽמָה׃ <WH8221> to Shepham

וְיָרַ֨ד <WH3381> shall go down הַגְּבֻ֧ל <WH1366> And the coast מִשְּׁפָ֛ם <WH8221> from Shepham הָרִבְלָ֖ה <WH7247> to Riblah מִקֶּ֣דֶם <WH6924> on the east side לָעָ֑יִן <WH5871> of Ain וְיָרַ֣ד <WH3381> shall descend הַגְּב֔וּל <WH1366> and the border וּמָחָ֛ה <WH4229> and shall reach עַל־ <WH5921> unto כֶּ֥תֶף <WH3802> unto the side יָם־ <WH3220> of the sea כִּנֶּ֖רֶת <WH3672> of Chinnereth קֵֽדְמָה׃ <WH6924> eastward

וְיָרַ֤ד <WH3381> shall go down הַגְּבוּל֙ <WH1366> And the border הַיַּרְדֵּ֔נָה <WH3383> to Jordan וְהָי֥וּ <WH1961> become תוֹצְאֹתָ֖יו <WH8444> and the goings out יָ֣ם <WH3220> sea הַמֶּ֑לַח <WH4417> of it shall be at the salt זֹאת֩ <WH2063> likewise תִּהְיֶ֨ה <WH1961> become לָכֶ֥ם הָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> this shall be your land לִגְבֻלֹתֶ֖יהָ <WH1367> with the coasts סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> thereof round about

וַיְצַ֣ו <WH6680> commanded מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying זֹ֣את <WH2063> likewise הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> This [is] the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which תִּתְנַחֲל֤וּ <WH5157> which ye shall inherit אֹתָהּ֙ <WH853> בְּגוֹרָ֔ל <WH1486> by lot אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> which the LORD לָתֵ֛ת <WH5414> to give לְתִשְׁעַ֥ת <WH8672> unto the nine הַמַּטּ֖וֹת <WH4294> tribes וַחֲצִ֥י <WH2677> and to the half הַמַּטֶּֽה׃ <WH4294> tribe

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לָקְח֞וּ <WH3947> have received מַטֵּ֨ה <WH4294> For the tribe בְנֵ֤י <WH1121> of the children הָראוּבֵנִי֙ <WH7206> of Reuben לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> according to the house אֲבֹתָ֔ם <WH1> of their fathers וּמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> and the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children הַגָּדִ֖י <WH1410> of Gad לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> according to the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <WH1> of their fathers וַחֲצִי֙ <WH2677> [their inheritance] and half מַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> the tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <WH4519> of Manasseh לָקְח֖וּ <WH3947> have received נַחֲלָתָֽם׃ <WH5159> their inheritance

שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> The two הַמַּטּ֖וֹת <WH4294> tribes וַחֲצִ֣י <WH2677> and the half הַמַּטֶּ֑ה <WH4294> tribe לָקְח֣וּ <WH3947> have received נַחֲלָתָ֗ם <WH5159> their inheritance מֵעֵ֛בֶר <WH5676> on this side לְיַרְדֵּ֥ן <WH3383> Jordan יְרֵח֖וֹ <WH3405> [near] Jericho קֵ֥דְמָה <WH6924> eastward מִזְרָֽחָה׃ <WH4217> toward the sunrising פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> These שְׁמ֣וֹת <WH8034> These [are] the names הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> of the men אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יִנְחֲל֥וּ <WH5157> which shall divide לָכֶ֖ם אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the land אֶלְעָזָר֙ <WH499> unto you Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> the priest וִיהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> and Joshua בִּן־ <WH1121> the son נֽוּן׃ <WH5126> of Nun

וְנָשִׂ֥יא <WH5387> prince אֶחָ֛ד <WH259> one נָשִׂ֥יא <WH5387> leader אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> one מִמַּטֶּ֑ה <WH4294> of every tribe תִּקְח֖וּ <WH3947> And ye shall take לִנְחֹ֥ל <WH5157> by inheritance אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the land

וְאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> These שְׁמ֣וֹת <WH8034> And the names הָאֲנָשִׁ֑ים <WH582> of the men לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> [are] these Of the tribe יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah כָּלֵ֖ב <WH3612> Caleb בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְפֻנֶּֽה׃ <WH3312> of Jephunneh
וּלְמַטֵּה֙ <WH4294> And of the tribe בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children שִׁמְע֔וֹן <WH8095> of Simeon שְׁמוּאֵ֖ל <WH8050> Shemuel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עַמִּיהֽוּד׃ <WH5989> of Ammihud
לְמַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> Of the tribe בִנְיָמִ֔ן <WH1144> of Benjamin אֱלִידָ֖ד <WH449> Elidad בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son כִּסְלֽוֹן׃ <WH3692> of Chislon
וּלְמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> of the tribe בְנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children דָ֖ן <WH1835> of Dan נָשִׂ֑יא <WH5387> And the prince בֻּקִּ֖י <WH1231> Bukki בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יָגְלִֽי׃ <WH3020> of Jogli

לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> of Joseph לְמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> for the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <WH4519> of Manasseh נָשִׂ֑יא <WH5387> The prince חַנִּיאֵ֖ל <WH2592> Hanniel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֵפֹֽד׃ <WH641> of Ephod

וּלְמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> of the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children אֶפְרַ֖יִם <WH669> of Ephraim נָשִׂ֑יא <WH5387> And the prince קְמוּאֵ֖ל <WH7055> Kemuel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שִׁפְטָֽן׃ <WH8204> of Shiphtan

וּלְמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> of the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children זְבוּלֻ֖ן <WH2074> of Zebulun נָשִׂ֑יא <WH5387> And the prince אֱלִיצָפָ֖ן <WH469> Elizaphan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son פַּרְנָֽךְ׃ <WH6535> of Parnach

וּלְמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> of the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשָׂשכָ֖ר <WH3485> of Issachar נָשִׂ֑יא <WH5387> And the prince פַּלְטִיאֵ֖ל <WH6409> Paltiel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עַזָּֽן׃ <WH5821> of Azzan

וּלְמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> of the tribe בְנֵי־ <WH1121> of the children אָשֵׁ֖ר <WH836> of Asher נָשִׂ֑יא <WH5387> And the prince אֲחִיה֖וּד <WH282> Ahihud בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שְׁלֹמִֽי׃ <WH8015> of Shelomi

וּלְמַטֵּ֥ה <WH4294> of the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children נַפְתָּלִ֖י <WH5321> of Naphtali נָשִׂ֑יא <WH5387> And the prince פְּדַהְאֵ֖ל <WH6300> Pedahel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son עַמִּיהֽוּד׃ <WH5989> of Ammihud

אֵ֕לֶּה <WH428> These אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> whom צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> These [are they] whom the LORD לְנַחֵ֥ל <WH5157> to divide the inheritance אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> of Canaan פ
